newsitem.text: Fall is here and soon will be a new update. The 12.00 update is the entrqnce to 2017 and advancement Will feature an abundance of patches and menu fixes and revamps based on Android N material design.

newsitem.headline: Hotfix Update
newsitem.text: A scheduled end of the summer patch will be releasing by October for Sapphire Launcher. This update will focus on some bugs that have been tracked for some time and fix some issues we've had in the past. To get an idea of what to expect, head on over to the Google Plus Community Group to find out what's in store for your experience! https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/115542523912843355119

newsitem.headline: Update and Review Ratings
newsitem.text: Please take some time to update and review your rating on the latest version of Sapphire Launcher and any License you have purchased. Higher ratings get the launcher noticed, which increases user counts and revenue which increase the likely hood of bigger and better updates.

newsitem.headline: Update 11.4. 00 Live
newsitem.text: Download now on google play or xda labs. Caution, Tracking an issue with dark statusbar enabled that borks the widget container while adding widgets to your workspace. Disable tweak to retain momentum. Will be looking for a fix soon.

newsitem.headline: Onyx and Premium License Update
newsitem.text: A scheduled update is due in October for Onyx and Prem license for licensing validation. This action is being taken to verify users for future license cary-over. The license you own will be carried over to other applications to prevent double purchases.

newsitem.headline: Onyx License Owners
newsitem.text: An early access awaits you in the future.

newsitem.headline: SUI Google Plus
newsitem.text: Join the Google Plus Group to get in on exclusive sneak peaks, dev previews, and one on one dev support!

newsitem.headline: Welcome and Thankyou for your support!
newsitem.text: Enjoy your stay, Ask questions, get involved with the communities and stay active! Sapphire UI is the community custom launcher powered by google exclusively for Android 5.0+
